amendatorysection.catchline: Board of Parole; created; act, how construed.
amendatorysection.para: There is hereby created the Board of Parole. For administrative purposes only, the board shall be within the Board of Pardons. Nothing in the Nebraska Treatment and Corrections Act shall be construed to give the director or the Board of Pardons any authority, power, or responsibility over the Board of Parole, its employees, or the exercise of its functions under the provisions of the act. The employees of the Board of Parole shall be covered by the State Personnel System.

crossreference.para: State Personnel System, see section 81-1301 to 81-1316.
